q: Colin Powell 's remarks In regard to the financial crisis, which Colin Powell called the candidates'`` final exam,'' Colin Powell said John McCain appeared unsteady in dealing with it, while Barack Obama had excelled in handling the situation. , Nov 28( UNHCR) UNHCR Goodwill Ambassador Angelina Jolie peered through the helicopter window at mile after mile of destroyed houses, and at the meagre possessions of poor Pakistanis buried in rubble strewn down the mountain sides. You fly over the area and you can't believe it, said Angelina Jolie during her three-day visit for the UN refugee agency that ended on Saturday.`` No one sitting at home has any idea what this really looks like.
